Key Match Events: LeBron James had 39 points, 7 rebounds, and 6 assists for the LA Lakers
Jaren Jackson Jr., Ja Morant, and rookie Jaylen Wells had 20 points apiece for the Memphis Grizzlies
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on November 6, 2024
Anthony Davis was ruled out due to a left heel injury
Others: Jaxson Hayes started the game in place of Anthony Davis for the LA Lakers
Cam Reddish had his best game of the season with 15 points, 6 rebounds, 2 assists, and 2 steals for the LA Lakers
